types.name: MemberPage

fields.name: items
fields.description: A list of Discord server members on the current page.

fields.name: next
fields.description: A reference to the next page of Discord server members, if available.

types.description: Represents a pageable list of Discord server members.

fields.name: one
fields.description: Retrieve data for a single user by their Discord ID

types.name: Guild

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the Discord server.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the Discord server.

fields.name: icon
fields.description: URL of the server's icon.

fields.name: owner
fields.description: Flag indicating if the authenticated user owns the server.

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: Bit set representing the server's permissions.

fields.name: features
fields.description: List of special features enabled for the server.

fields.name: channels
fields.description: Collection of channels within the server.

fields.name: commands
fields.description: Collection of custom commands available in the server.

fields.name: members
fields.description: Collection of members who are part of the server.

actions.name: createCommand

params.name: name
params.description: Name assigned to the new command.

params.name: description
params.description: Short description for the new command.

params.name: options
params.description: JSON-formatted options to customize the command.

params.name: type
params.description: Integer indicating the type of the command to be created.

actions.description: Action to create a new custom command for the server.

events.name: onSlashCommand
events.description: Event emitted when a slash command is invoked in the server.

types.description: Type representing a Discord server, including its properties, channels, commands, and members.

types.name: MessageCollection

fields.name: one

params.name: id
params.description: Identifier of the message to be retrieved from Discord.

fields.description: Fetches a specific Discord message using its unique ID.

fields.name: items

params.name: limit
params.description: Limits the number of messages returned in the list. If not specified, a default limit is applied.

params.name: around
params.description: Centers the retrieved message list around the message with the specified ID.

params.name: before
params.description: Retrieves messages posted before the message with the specified ID.

params.name: after
params.description: Retrieves messages posted after the message with the specified ID.

fields.description: Obtains a list of Discord messages, offering several filter criteria such as message ID ranges and limits.

types.description: Collection of messages available in Discord.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the channel.

fields.name: last_message_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the last message sent in the channel.

fields.name: rate_limit_per_user
fields.description: The rate limit for users in the channel.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the channel.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the channel.

fields.name: position
fields.description: The position of the channel.

fields.name: flags
fields.description: The flags associated with the channel.

fields.name: nsfw
fields.description: Indicates if the channel is NSFW (Not Safe For Work).

fields.name: parend_id
fields.description: The parent channel ID, if the channel is a sub-channel.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic of the channel.

fields.name: guild_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the guild to which the channel belongs.

fields.name: permissions_overwrites
fields.description: The list of permission overwrites for the channel.

fields.name: messages
fields.description: A collection of messages sent in the channel.

actions.name: sendMessage

params.name: content
params.description: The content of the message to send.

params.name: payload_json
params.description: The payload of the message in JSON format.

params.name: flags
params.description: The flags to be applied to the message.

params.name: sticker_ids
params.description: The IDs of the stickers to be sent with the message.

params.name: components
params.description: The components to be included in the message.

params.name: embeds
params.description: The embeds to be included in the message.

actions.description: Send a message to the channel.

types.name: Message

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the message.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the message indicating whether it's a default message, a recipient add, etc.

fields.name: content
fields.description: Text content of the message.

fields.name: channel_id
fields.description: Identifier of the channel where the message was posted.

fields.name: pinned
fields.description: Indicates if the message is pinned in the channel.

fields.name: mention_everyone
fields.description: Indicates if the message mentions everyone in the channel.

fields.name: tts
fields.description: Indicates if text-to-speech is enabled for the message.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

fields.name: edited_timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp of when the message was last edited.

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Flags associated with the message for various features and states.

fields.name: author
fields.description: User object representing the author of the message.

fields.name: attachments
fields.description: Attachments included with the message as a JSON string.

fields.name: embeds
fields.description: Embedded content such as images or videos included in the message as a JSON string.

fields.name: mentions
fields.description: List of user objects representing the users mentioned in the message.

fields.name: mention_roles
fields.description: Roles mentioned in the message as a JSON string of IDs.

fields.name: reactions
fields.description: List of reactions added to the message.

types.description: Represents a message posted in a Discord channel.

types.name: Member

fields.name: user
fields.description: Discord user information associated with the member.

fields.name: nick
fields.description: The member's chosen nickname within the Discord server.

fields.name: roles
fields.description: Identifiers for each role assigned to the member in the Discord server.

fields.name: joined_at
fields.description: Timestamp marking when the member first joined the Discord server.

fields.name: premium_since
fields.description: Timestamp indicating the start of the member's Nitro boost for the server.

fields.name: deaf
fields.description: States if the member is deafened by the server, preventing them from hearing others.

fields.name: mute
fields.description: Indicates if the member is muted by the server, preventing them from speaking.

fields.name: pending
fields.description: Reflects whether the member has yet to complete required Membership Screening before full participation.

fields.name: avatar
fields.description: Direct link to the member's custom avatar within the server, if set.

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Numerical value representing specific permissions or features available to the member.

types.description: Represents the details of a Discord server member.

types.name: User

fields.name: id
fields.description: The Discord user's unique identifier.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username of the Discord user, not including the discriminator part.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The custom or server-specific nickname of the Discord user.

fields.name: avatar
fields.description: URL linking to the Discord user's profile picture.

fields.name: avatar_decoration
fields.description: Additional graphical elements applied to the user's avatar on Discord.

fields.name: discriminator
fields.description: A unique four-digit tag associated with the user's username.

fields.name: public_flags
fields.description: Binary flags representing the achievements and statuses of the Discord user.

fields.name: bot
fields.description: A boolean indicating if the user is an automated bot account.

types.description: Represents a user on the Discord platform, including their basic profile information.

types.name: Reaction

fields.name: count
fields.description: The number of times the specific emoji has been used as a reaction

fields.name: me
fields.description: Indicates whether the current user has reacted using the emoji

fields.name: emoji
fields.description: The emoji used to react to the message

types.description: Represents a reaction made to a message in Discord

types.name: Command

fields.name: name
fields.description: The unique name of the command.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief explanation of what the command does.

fields.name: default_member_permissions
fields.description: Permissions required for a server member to use the command.

fields.name: default_permission
fields.description: Indicates whether the command is enabled by default for everyone.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of command, represented as an integer.

fields.name: nsfw
fields.description: Flag indicating whether the command is Not Safe For Work.

fields.name: options
fields.description: A list of options for the command.

actions.name: delete
actions.description: Deletes the command from the Discord environment.

types.description: Represents a command in the Discord environment.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the emoji.

fields.name: user
fields.description: User who uploaded the emoji.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Official name of the emoji.

fields.name: animated
fields.description: Flag indicating if the emoji has animation.

fields.name: available
fields.description: Availability status of the emoji for use.

fields.name: require_colons
fields.description: Whether colons are required for the emoji's use.

fields.name: managed
fields.description: Indicates if an integration or bot manages the emoji.

fields.name: roles
fields.description: List of roles with access to the emoji.

types.name: SlashCommand

fields.name: user
fields.description: The Discord user who executed the slash command.

fields.name: application_id
fields.description: ID of the Discord application to which the slash command is associated.

fields.name: token
fields.description: Authentication token for verifying and responding to the slash command interaction.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Parameters provided by the user when invoking the slash command.

types.description: Represents a Discord interaction where a user invokes a command via a special text trigger.

types.name: CommandOption

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the command option.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the command option.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the command option.

types.description: Represents an option provided in a Discord command.

types.name: Tests

actions.name: testGetGuilds

actions.name: ping
actions.description: Action to test the Discord bot's responsiveness.

actions.name: testGetUsers
actions.description: Action to test the retrieval of users from Discord.

actions.name: testGetChannels
actions.description: Action to test the retrieval of channels from Discord.

types.description: Type used for executing test actions related to Discord functionality.
